## About Me

I am a third year PhD candidate in Statistics and Data Science and a
Research Assistant in the Institute for Policy Research at Northwestern
University. My research focuses on unsupervised learning and machine
learning for multivariate meta-analyses. More specifically, my work
statistically robust methods for exploratory analysis on hierarchical
data.

## Skills

-   Machine Learning
-   Meta Analysis
-   Exploratory Analysis
-   Statistical Modeling and Analysis
-   Data Visualization
-   Experimental Design
-   Unsupervised Learning
